summary: REQ-26 appears implemented in the Story detail UI (verses presented under a "Scripture" heading and the Summary moved to the bottom). Backend KJV story expansion (REQ-24) is only partially evidenced (a few KJV-tagged stories shown; not enough evidence of "all major Bible stories"), and there is no visible evidence that the Daily Verse curated set was updated to KJV (REQ-25).

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend Stories dataset so Stories use King James Version (KJV) text and include all major Bible stories, with narrative verses only.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt of `initialStories` shows only a small handful of stories (e.g., "Creation", "Noah's Ark", "Moses and the Exodus"), and the file is truncated, so there is insufficient evidence that the dataset was expanded to include "all major Bible stories". Also, multiple verse texts contain ellipses ("..."), which makes it unclear that the stored text is complete KJV verse wording.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend Daily Verse curated set so all daily verse texts are in King James Version (KJV) wording.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt for `backend/main.mo` shows story dataset changes but does not show the Daily Verse curated set or any updates to daily verse text content; due to truncation, there is no concrete evidence that all daily verses were converted to KJV.
